summary: This document is an email exchange from September 20, 2021, between an unidentified sender and a Special Agent from the U.S. Department of Justice Office of the Inspector General's New York Field Office. The email discusses arranging a conversation regarding the Epstein case.

persons.name: Special Agent
persons.role: Special Agent, U.S. Department of Justice Office of the Inspector General
persons.context: A Special Agent from the DOJ OIG's New York Field Office is being asked to speak regarding the Epstein case.

keyFacts: The email is dated September 20, 2021, indicating ongoing activity related to the Epstein case years after his death.
The correspondence involves a Special Agent from the U.S. Department of Justice Office of the Inspector General.
The subject is arranging a conversation specifically about the Epstein case.
The communication originates from the New York Field Office of the DOJ OIG.
